channel.title: SourceForge.net: SF.net Project News: ffencoderd
channel.description: SF.net Project News: ffencoderd (ffencoderd project) - ffencoderd is a little daemon written in perl to automate video encoding using ffmpeg. Based on Flix engine/SDK by On2 functionality. Processes are sent to encode through an API. It's main purpose is to encode video files to FLV (Flash Video Format)
channel.copyright: Copyright and acceptable usage information for this RSS feed may be found at: http://sourceforge.net/docman/display_doc.php?docid=6048&group_id=1#licensing_and_other_terms

image.title: SourceForge.net logo
image.description: The world's largest Open Source software development website

item.title: New 0.4 Beta version on the way
item.description: Hi, i've been working in a new version of ffencoderd which will have implemented some new features mainly a SOAP API and a prefork HTTP implementation so now ffencoderd can run itself with no other such as Apache, don't be afraid you'll be able to run both, just using different port numbers, but if you want to have just a standalone machine to encode videos this will be perfect. (0 comments)
item.author: makoki@users.sourceforge.net (iag252)

item.title: Brief guide of ffencoderd in spanish
item.description: I've just posted at my blog webdynamix.blogspot.com a brief guide (in spanish) about how to use ffencoderd. (0 comments)

item.title: first release of ffencoderd on the way
item.description: The first release of ffencoderd is out. This first release has just come out with basic features planned, I hope it will be useful some. (0 comments)
